OOC: Great entrace :)

IC:

In a corder Nightstrike looked the new comers w=
ith a mix of distrust and surprice.


 Message ----- 
  From: supercyclonus=
 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, October 16, 2007 3:44 PM
 =
 Subject: The Minions stir


  OOC: Please keep in mind I am using the mini=
on description as is 
  posted on Wiki. 

  In the depths of space, on the =
far side of earth's moon, hidden from 
  sensors and prying optics a small =
but powerful warp distortion 
  appears for a moment and then vanishes with=
out a trace, leaving 
  something behind .. 

  Swift and agile, shadows ap=
pear around the dark and silent moon; 
  sensor ghosts, appearing for a mom=
ent, but then gone again before 
  they can be locked on to. Quickly they d=
escend to the surface of the 
  moon like some dark plague upon an unsuspec=
ting victim. Many seem to 
  disappear beneath the surface, while others sc=
our the surface, moving 
  to and fro over the apparently dead surface of e=
arth's moon. 

  Two of the shadows break away from the rest, shift into a =
humanoid 
  form and land. "Is this the correct place? If he was here we wo=
uld 
  have found him by now!"

  "Yes." Said the other figure, his figure =
is sleek and agile, purple 
  framed with silver highlights. "Have patience=
. No doubt he has just 
  hidden his signature. We know where to look thoug=
h."

  The first figure nodded as the two continued on, his form looking 
 =
 winged as the shadows played over his blue and white form. 

  Before long=
 they came to a large set of doors, set into a 
  mountainside. Doors const=
ructed in such a way that they would be 
  hidden if they were not standing=
 open as if beckoning the duo inside. 

  Without a glance the larger purpl=
e figure stepped inside, even as the 
  winged one hesitated. "Come." Said =
the first in calm confident 
  tones. "He is here. I can feel him." The oth=
er followed, looks of 
  both fear and confidence fighting a war on his met=
allically bearded 
  face. 

  Great vaulting caverns greeted the two as th=
ey walked; ancient stone, 
  unworked and yet beautiful in its own way. "He=
 is here, Vorpal is 
  here." The winged figure's voice is confidence and a=
lmost aggression 
  as he spoke.

  "Yes." Said the other figure, his steps=
 measured and confident. "As 
  Unicron had already told us." Quickly they =
emerged into a large 
  chamber filled with dim lights and probing shadows.=
 Moving to the 
  center of the chamber, to the front of what could only be=
 a throne 
  they stood finally before the presence of Vorpal, Leader of th=
e 
  minions in this area. 

  "My lord." Said the larger purple armored fi=
gure as he knelt. "I am 
  Cyclonus." He gestured behind him as the other a=
lso followed 
  suit, "and this is Scourge. We have been sent by Mighty Uni=
cron to 
  aid you in the eradication of all his enemies." Cyclonus bowed h=
is 
  head. "What are your orders?"

  OOC: Please note that this is NOT th=
e Cyclonus and Scourge that 
  previously appeared on this website. I note =
that they have been 
  absent since about 2001. So you can think of these a=
s clones or total 
  reformats of them from Unicron. But since they have be=
en gone for so 
  long, and they are characters that belong to Hasbro or wh=
o ever, I 
  hope no one objects to their use. They will not have the memor=
ies of 
  those that already appeared. I can rename them if it makes it eas=
ier 
  for the group as a whole.
